_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The outcomes of the effort to preserve (: Skillful qualities that have arisen remain
Skillful qualities that have arisen are not lost
Skillful qualities that have arisen increase
Skillful qualities that have arisen mature
Skillful qualities that have arisen are fulfilled by development
